title: Puzzle Mountain
text:
Puzzle Mountain is a <a href="twin-summit">twin-summit</a> <a href="mountain">mountain</a> on <a href="Vancouver%20Island">Vancouver Island</a>, <a href="British%20Columbia">British Columbia</a>, <a href="Canada">Canada</a>, located east of <a href="Gold%20River%2C%20British%20Columbia">Gold River</a> and northwest of <a href="Mount%20Colonel%20Foster">Mount Colonel Foster</a>.
History.
Puzzle Mountain is named for the maze of snow patches on its northeast face.
